name: SelectManager
description: SelectManager stores the selected, who, and playerid properties from the last user-generated message (as opposed to API generated), and makes them available for another script to retrieve. This solves the problem of an API-generated message not having the original array of selected tokens, for instance. It also provides a !forselected handle to iterate over the selected tokens, firing off an individual call to another script for each token in turn, making each the selected token.Finally, it offers a way to virtually select tokens for the message, or to inject tokens into the selected token array.For more information, see the original thread in the API forum:[SelectManager Forum Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/9817678/script-selectmanager-update-brings-forselected-iteration-and-gives-user-new-control-to-give-selected-tokens-back-to-api-generated-messages)Or read about the full set of meta-scripts available: [Meta Toolbox Forum Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/10005695/script-set-the-meta-toolbox)
